original_text: The Lord is the same as the Spirit. And when the Lord's Spirit is with anyone, that person is free.
korean_text: 주는 영이시니 주의 영이 계신 곳에는 자유가 있느니라

sentences.original_text: The Lord is the same as the Spirit.
And when the Lord's Spirit is with anyone,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주님의 영이 누군가와 함께 있을 때,
